mapper.insert: MERGE INTO PERSON p USING (SELECT #{personId} AS personId FROM DUAL) src ON (p.personId = src.personId) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.personName = #{personName}, p.biography = #{biography}, p.profilePath = #{profilePath} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (personId, personName, biography, profilePath) VALUES (#{personId}, #{personName}, #{biography}, #{profilePath})
mapper.select: SELECT personId, personName, biography, profilePath FROM PERSON WHERE personId = #{personId}
SELECT personId, personName, profilePath FROM PERSON WHERE personName LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY personName FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
